Embark on a chilling odyssey through the enigmatic corridors of the human mind in Shaytan, a psychological horror puzzle game that will haunt your senses. As the protagonist, you find yourself ensnared by the malevolent grasp of Shaytan, the very devil who once beguiled Adam into tasting the forbidden fruit in paradise.
